name.japanese: ロングリングロングランド

geography: A unique island composed of long, thin landmasses connected in a ring formation. The island floods annually, creating the ring-shaped appearance.

keyEvents.title: Donut Race Around Long Ring Long Land
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats and Foxy Pirates race their makeshift boats around the perimeter of the island in the first round of the Davy Back Fight.
keyEvents.significance: The island's unique geography provides the race course for the Donut Race, with various natural obstacles like whirlpools and coral reefs.

statusHistory.description: Island discovered by Straw Hats and serves as location for Davy Back Fight

culturalSignificance: Traditional location for Davy Back Fight competitions between pirate crews.
climate: Temperate, with annual flooding that reveals and conceals portions of the island.
notableFeatures: Ring-shaped formation of long, thin landmasses
Annual flooding creates the 'donut' shape used for racing
Natural obstacles including whirlpools and coral reefs around the perimeter
Suitable for hosting Davy Back Fight competitions
